DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood , tissue , bone marrow patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study dexamethasone prednisone sensitivity sample young patient high-risk B-cell precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Dexamethasone Prednisone Sensitivity Samples From Younger Patients With High-Risk B-Cell Precursor Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Identify difference effect dexamethasone ( Dex ) prednisone ( Pred ) glucocorticoid receptor ( GR ) occupancy gene expression high-risk ( HR ) B-cell precursor ( BCP ) -acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) sample patient age 1-9 . - Identify difference gene expression GR occupancy response element HR BCP-ALL patient > 10 year old response Dex Pred . OUTLINE : Archived sample analyze gene expression analysis genomic location glucocorticoid receptor ChIP sequencing ( ChiPseq ) RNA sequence . Data gene expression ChiPseq data set compare luciferase reporter assay .
